metadata.title: CVE-2025-21567 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: Security: Privileges).  Supported versions that are affected are9.1.0 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privilegedattacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQLServer.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result inunauthorized read access to a subset of MySQL Server accessible data. CVSS3.1 Base Score 4.3 (Confidentiality impacts).  CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.3 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
